lead_paragraph: As Barack Obama began preparing to leave office, the first smartphone-toting U.S. president ordered his team to upgrade the White House's aging technology for his successor. New computers were purchased and faster internet was installed.
snippet: As Barack Obama began preparing to leave office, the first smartphone-toting U.S. president ordered his team to upgrade the White House's aging technology for his successor. New computers were purchased and faster internet was installed....

headline.main: Obama Boosted White House Technology; Trump Sees Risks
headline.print_headline: Obama Boosted White House Technology; Trump Sees Risks
